characters.name: Acrobat
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player: if they are or become drunk or poisoned tonight, you die.

characters.name: Alchemist
characters.description: You have a Minion ability. When using this, the Storyteller may prompt you to choose differently.

characters.name: Alsaahir
characters.description: Each day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

characters.name: Amnesiac
characters.description: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.

characters.name: Artist
characters.description: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

characters.name: Atheist
characters.description: The Storyteller can break the game rules, and if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]

characters.name: Balloonist
characters.description: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

characters.name: Banshee
characters.description: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

characters.name: Bounty Hunter
characters.description: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]

characters.name: Cannibal
characters.description: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

characters.name: Chambermaid
characters.description: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

characters.name: Chef
characters.description: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

characters.name: Choirboy
characters.description: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+the King]

characters.name: Clockmaker
characters.description: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.

characters.name: Courtier
characters.description: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

characters.name: Cult Leader
characters.description: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbor. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.

characters.name: Dreamer
characters.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.

characters.name: Empath
characters.description: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

characters.name: Engineer
characters.description: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.

characters.name: Exorcist
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

characters.name: Farmer
characters.description: When you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.

characters.name: Fisherman
characters.description: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help your team win.

characters.name: Flowergirl
characters.description: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.

characters.name: Fool
characters.description: The 1st time you die, you don't.

characters.name: Fortune Teller
characters.description: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

characters.name: Gambler
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

characters.name: General
characters.description: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.

characters.name: Gossip
characters.description: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

characters.name: Grandmother
characters.description: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.

characters.name: High Priestess
characters.description: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

characters.name: Huntsman
characters.description: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]

characters.name: Innkeeper
characters.description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

characters.name: Investigator
characters.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

characters.name: Juggler
characters.description: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.

characters.name: King
characters.description: Each night, if the dead equal or outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows you are the King.

characters.name: Knight
characters.description: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.

characters.name: Librarian
characters.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

characters.name: Lycanthrope
characters.description: Each night*, choose an alive player. If good, they die & the Demon doesn’t kill tonight. One good player registers as evil.

characters.name: Magician
characters.description: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.

characters.name: Mathematician
characters.description: Each night, you learn how many players' abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.

characters.name: Mayor
characters.description: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

characters.name: Minstrel
characters.description: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

characters.name: Monk
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

characters.name: Nightwatchman
characters.description: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn you are the Nightwatchman.

characters.name: Noble
characters.description: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.

characters.name: Oracle
characters.description: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.

characters.name: Pacifist
characters.description: Executed good players might not die.

characters.name: Philosopher
characters.description: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.

characters.name: Pixie
characters.description: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.

characters.name: Poppy Grower
characters.description: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.

characters.name: Preacher
characters.description: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.

characters.name: Professor
characters.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

characters.name: Ravenkeeper
characters.description: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

characters.name: Sage
characters.description: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

characters.name: Sailor
characters.description: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

characters.name: Savant
characters.description: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

characters.name: Seamstress
characters.description: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

characters.name: Shugenja
characters.description: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

characters.name: Slayer
characters.description: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

characters.name: Snake Charmer
characters.description: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

characters.name: Soldier
characters.description: You are safe from the Demon.

characters.name: Steward
characters.description: You start knowing 1 good player.

characters.name: Tea Lady
characters.description: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.

characters.name: Town Crier
characters.description: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.

characters.name: Undertaker
characters.description: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

characters.name: Village Idiot 1
characters.description: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]

characters.name: Village Idiot 2
characters.description: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]

characters.name: Village Idiot 3
characters.description: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]

characters.name: Virgin
characters.description: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

characters.name: Washerwoman
characters.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk

characters.name: Barber
characters.description: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.

characters.name: Butler
characters.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

characters.name: Damsel
characters.description: All Minions know a Damsel is in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.

characters.name: Drunk
characters.description: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

characters.name: Golem
characters.description: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.

characters.name: Goon
characters.description: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

characters.name: Hatter
characters.description: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

characters.name: Heretic
characters.description: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.

characters.name: Klutz
characters.description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

characters.name: Lunatic
characters.description: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.

characters.name: Moonchild
characters.description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.

characters.name: Mutant
characters.description: If you are "mad" about being an Outsider, you might be executed.

characters.name: Ogre
characters.description: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

characters.name: Plague Doctor
characters.description: When you die, the Storyteller gains a Minion ability.

characters.name: Politician
characters.description: If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.

characters.name: Puzzlemaster
characters.description: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.

characters.name: Recluse
characters.description: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

characters.name: Saint
characters.description: If you die by execution, your team loses.

characters.name: Snitch
characters.description: Each Minion gets 3 bluffs.

characters.name: Sweetheart
characters.description: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

characters.name: Tinker
characters.description: You might die at any time.

characters.name: Zealot
characters.description: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

characters.name: Assassin
characters.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

characters.name: Baron
characters.description: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

characters.name: Boffin
characters.description: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.

characters.name: Boomdandy
characters.description: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. After a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most players pointing at them, dies.

characters.name: Cerenovus
characters.description: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are "mad" they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.

characters.name: Devil's Advocate
characters.description: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

characters.name: Evil Twin
characters.description: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

characters.name: Fearmonger
characters.description: Each night, choose a player: if you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.

characters.name: Goblin
characters.description: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.

characters.name: Godfather
characters.description: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

characters.name: Harpy
characters.description: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or one or both might die.

characters.name: Marionette
characters.description: You think you are a good character, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbor the Demon]

characters.name: Mastermind
characters.description: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

characters.name: Mezepheles
characters.description: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.

characters.name: Organ Grinder
characters.description: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Each night, choose if you are drunk until dusk.

characters.name: Pit-Hag
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not in play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

characters.name: Poisoner
characters.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

characters.name: Psychopath
characters.description: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.

characters.name: Scarlet Woman
characters.description: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count)

characters.name: Spy
characters.description: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

characters.name: Summoner
characters.description: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

characters.name: Vizier
characters.description: All players know you are the Vizier. You cannot die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

characters.name: Widow
characters.description: On your first night, look at the Grimoire & choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.

characters.name: Witch
characters.description: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

characters.name: Wizard
characters.description: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, it might have a price & leave a clue as to its nature.

characters.name: Xaan
characters.description: On night X, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk. [X Outsiders]

characters.name: Al-Hadikhia
characters.description: Each night*, you may choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.

characters.name: Fang Gu
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]

characters.name: Imp
characters.description: Each nicht*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

characters.name: Kazali
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are which Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]

characters.name: Legion
characters.description: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]

characters.name: Leviathan
characters.description: If more than 1 good player is executed, evil wins. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.

characters.name: Lil' Monsta
characters.description: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta & 'is the Demon'. Each night*, a player might die. [+1 Minion]

characters.name: Lleech
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing a player: they are poisoned. You die if & only if they are dead.

characters.name: Lord of Typhon
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outsiders]

characters.name: No Dashii
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned.

characters.name: Ojo
characters.description: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

characters.name: Po
characters.description: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

characters.name: Pukka
characters.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

characters.name: Riot
characters.description: On day 3, Minions become Riot & nominees die but nominate an alive player immediately. This must happen.

characters.name: Shabaloth
characters.description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

characters.name: Vigormortis
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 Outsider]

characters.name: Vortox
characters.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.

characters.name: Yaggababble
characters.description: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.

characters.name: Zombuul
characters.description: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.

characters.name: Apprentice
characters.description: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good) or a Minion ability (if evil).

characters.name: Barista
characters.description: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.

characters.name: Beggar
characters.description: You must use a vote token to vote. If a dead player gives you theirs, you learn their alignment. You are sober and healthy.

characters.name: Bishop
characters.description: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposing player must be nominated each day.

characters.name: Bone Collector
characters.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.

characters.name: Bureaucrat
characters.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.

characters.name: Butcher
characters.description: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.

characters.name: Deviant
characters.description: If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.

characters.name: Gangster
characters.description: Once per day, you may choose to kill an alive neighbor, if your other alive neighbor agrees.

characters.name: Gnome
characters.description: All players start knowing a player of your alignment. You may choose to kill anyone who nominates them.

characters.name: Gunslinger
characters.description: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.

characters.name: Harlot
characters.description: Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.

characters.name: Judge
characters.description: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.

characters.name: Matron
characters.description: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.

characters.name: Scapegoat
characters.description: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.

characters.name: Thief
characters.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.

characters.name: Voudon
characters.description: Only you & the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority isn't required.

characters.name: Angel
characters.description: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.

characters.name: Bootlegger
characters.description: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

characters.name: Buddhist
characters.description: For the first 2 minutes of each day, veteran players may not talk.

characters.name: Djinn
characters.description: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.

characters.name: Doomsayer
characters.description: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.description: Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you. At night*, each visitor learns how many visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.

characters.name: Ferryman
characters.description: On the final day, all dead players regain their vote token.

characters.name: Fibbin
characters.description: Once per game, 1 good player might get incorrect information.

characters.name: Fiddler
characters.description: Once per game, the Demon secretly chooses an opposing player: all players choose which of these 2 players win.

characters.name: Gardener
characters.description: The Storyteller assigns 1 or more players' characters.

characters.name: Hell's Librarian
characters.description: Something bad might happen to whoever talks when the Storyteller has asked for silence.

characters.name: Revolutionary
characters.description: 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment. Once per game, 1 of them registers falsely.

characters.name: Sentinel
characters.description: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.

characters.name: Spirit of Ivory
characters.description: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.

characters.name: Storm Catcher
characters.description: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.

characters.name: Toymaker
characters.description: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.
